name: Celestial (pirotechstudios)
description: An unexpected fellowship of three very different souls is formed when they find themselves together in a mystical labyrinth of churning depths and ancient puzzles, and only through teamwork and coordination will they find their way out. That is where you, the player come in. Take the reins of the adventure; Utilize the diverse abilities and interactions each patron has upon the world around them to unravel the mysteries of the dungeon and achieve freedom.
